arts.sum: Team form, absentees and our predicted XIs The post Crystal Palace v Bournemouth predicted line-ups + FPL team news appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace v Bournemouth: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 8, 2025
arts.sum: Palace return from the international break looking to respond after their first defeat of the season; a late 2-1 loss away to Everton that ended their remarkable 19-game unbeaten run in the league. Two of the Premier League ’s surprise packages meet this weekend, as high-flying Bournemouth travel to face an equally confident Crystal Palace side in South London.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: High-flying Bournemouth face in-form Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Bournemouth have been unbeaten since their opening league fixture against Liverpool, whilst Palace come into the game off the back of their first loss; a late Jack Grealish winner for Everton ending the Eagles’ 19-game unbeaten streak. Defensively, both teams are impressive, each keeping three clean sheets and conceding under ten goals, with Palace boasting the joint-second best record with just five.
